recommendations: ‚ÄúI have worked closely with Vikas in building the Private Label business for Noon. I can attest to his exceptional business acumen and dedication to driving growth. Vikas has demonstrated an innate ability to build and cultivate successful business. His strategic vision and meticulous execution have been instrumental in steering our projects toward remarkable achievements. Notably, his adept leadership has translated into significant growth, a testament to his insightful decision-making and adept management of resources. His leadership style not only empowers his team but also ensures a harmonious and productive work culture. I would surely recommend him for any venture that values leadership, strategic thinking, and unwavering dedication to success.‚Äù Show less

‚ÄúI have worked closely with Vikas to bootstrap Noon's Private Label brands in the region. His ability to leverage analytics to strategize our product selection, sourcing, supply chain, merchandising etc helped us to successfully launch 20+ product categories in UAE and KSA in a span of ~ 3 years. Over a period of time, I have seen him developing his people management skills to build a high performance team for us at Noon. He doesn't shy from taking calculated risks and sharing his bold opinions. He will be a great asset to any team & don't miss any opportunity to engage with him.‚Äù Show less
